hex.description:
hex
Pass in a 6 digit hexadecimal color to fill R G and B values. You can also include the # symbol, but it's not required.
   
Text

* Minimum Length allowed is 6
* Maximum Length allowed is 7

red.description:
red
Represents the red channel. Only define this if you are not defining the hex value.
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 0
* Minimum allowed is 0
* Maximum allowed is 255

green.description:
green
Represents the green channel. Only define this if you are not defining the hex value.
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 0
* Minimum allowed is 0
* Maximum allowed is 255

blue.description:
blue
Represents the blue channel. Only define this if you are not defining the hex value.
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 0
* Minimum allowed is 0
* Maximum allowed is 255
